title: Elegant watchface with Weather
summary: Beauty and very useful watch face
description: Szukam chetnych do wspolpracyKod zródłowy dla zainteresowanych :)Features of the watch face:★Analog and digital★ 12H/24H Mode★ Date, day, month, week day, week number★ Second time★ Weather information★ Current temperature, Max and Min★ °C/°F★ Show town where you are now★ Wind speed and direction★ Pressure indicator★ Humidity indicator★ Wear battery indicator★ Phone battery indicator★ No internet indicator★ GPS OFF indicator★ Permissions GPS (Android 6)and moreFor ANDROID 6 or higher users:Go to SETTINGS->GENERAL->Apps,Find Elegant Weather->Permissions->Grand Location Permission
descriptionHTML:
Szukam chetnych do wspolpracy

Kod zródłowy dla zainteresowanych :)

Features of the watch face:

★Analog and digital
★ 12H/24H Mode
★ Date, day, month, week day, week number
★ Second time
★ Weather information
★ Current temperature, Max and Min
★ °C/°F
★ Show town where you are now
★ Wind speed and direction
★ Pressure indicator
★ Humidity indicator
★ Wear battery indicator
★ Phone battery indicator
★ No internet indicator
★ GPS OFF indicator
★ Permissions GPS (Android 6)

and more


For ANDROID 6 or higher users:
Go to SETTINGS->GENERAL->Apps,
Find Elegant Weather->Permissions->Grand Location Permission
